headline: CEOs might be thinking about AI adoption in the wrong way
summary: Artificial intelligence (AI) adoption among CEOs will be a key theme of 2026, Harvard University executive education fellow and former Medtronic CEO Bill George says. Watch the video above to hear George explain how CEOs should be approaching AI implementation. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.
